name: mailtrap
title: Mailtrap
description: Mailtrap - View Inboxes, Emails, Copy Subjects while marking as Read
author: samjwillis97

commands.name: get-mailtrap-subject
commands.title: List Inboxes
commands.subtitle: Mailtrap
commands.description: Navigate emails and copy information from subject line to your clipboard

preferences.name: clipboardRegex
preferences.description: A regex to match specific your current clipboard. If a match is found it will be automatically pasted into the email search
preferences.title: Clipboard Regex

preferences.name: subjectRegex
preferences.description: A regex to match specific subsets from subject line to be copied to clipboard
preferences.title: Matching Regex

preferences.name: inboxId
preferences.description: The ID of the inbox you prefer to use
preferences.title: Inbox ID

preferences.name: autoPaste
preferences.title: Auto Paste
preferences.label: Enable automatic pasting of content
preferences.description: Automatically paste the selected email subject text to your last program

preferences.name: onlyShowUnread
preferences.title: Hide Read
preferences.label: Hide read emails
preferences.description: When enabled read emails will be hidden

" && exit 1
